attributes.action: Reinstate the death penalty,allow the country to have a referendum on the subject.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Violent crime is on the increase and there is every indication that this rise will not stop .Prisons are put under pressure to house criminals who cannot be rehabilitated,they either do not want to change or are not able to.Children are tortured to death ,abused and maimed and we as a country only inprison them for a matter of years.Now is the time to erradicate these monsters from our society and protect the innocent.It is the governments duty to look at all avenues and seriously consider capital punishment.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
